fields.description:
h5.Description

When building for ws-local the build should pause to allow the user to import the certificate as the build will fail  if they do not complete the workflow quick enough


h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Build a project that does not have a pfx file
2. Create the pfx through the prompts
3. When prompted to import the cert do not do anything

h5.Actual result

The build will continue and fail

h5.Expected result

The build should pause allowing time for the user to follow the workflow
fields.summary: CLI: Windows: The build process should pause to allow the user to import the certificate
fields.environment:
Windows 8.1

comments.body:
Verified the fix.

The build process stops & waits till the user imports the cert.

Closing.
